divs: sighting details9\28\11-near bridgeport, ca,- approx. 9:30 pm. blm land, no moon, very dark, fantastic sky, lots of universe to see. looking up, i saw a very bright, white light in the sky, which i figured was a star or planet. as i continued to look, i noticed it moving\bobbing, then be still. it appeared to have a single bright, white light, front & center. there was a lot of glare, so i squinted my eyes, attempting to ascertain the shape\size. appeared semi-circular, silver metallic, non-smooth with some type of pattern. moved to a better location, the object hovered, at times bobbed\moved. a few hours later, noticed 6-8 circular objects, with flashing multi-colored lights over the horizon in all four directions. the bright white object in the center. then, saw multi-colored, flashing lights approach from ne, much lower on the horizon, actually lighting up the ground. this object ascended, became pale blue & hovered around the same altitude as the white object, facing each other, where they remained until dawn. once it was light out, both objects began to slowly ascend until they could no longer be seen. the white object went se; the blue object ne. this was a surreal, yet very real, event that left me in pure amazement, esp. since i had seen the objects in the daylight. 9\29\11 - 10\3\11 - carson valley, nv - the same white object has appeared at approx. 10 pm pst, sw sky, the multi-colored, flashing objects are off to the east. ascends slowly at dawn until it disappears out of sight. they are out there right now (10\3 - 3:25 am pst). i counted 5 of the multi-colored objects, which are in line\formation from n to s. unfortunately, i have no video\photos. surely, others have witnessed this over the past week. i've never seen anything like it, esp. remaining in one spot & disappearing at daybreak. any ideas? any other reports? thank you.
Summary: Bright white light, metallic body, mostly hovered for 8 hours, accompanied by other crafts. slosly ascended into sky at dawn & until it disappeared from sight.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in bridgeport
There were no other sightings in bridgeport on or around September 28th 2011
